title: My Account Just Got Perma-Banned Without 1 Warning
body:
https://s24.postimg.org/mzkeqi7lh/Screenshot_12.png


Note: The following chat logs are obviously gonna be toxic, not saying theyre not like most other forum posts.

Game 1: To be honest, this one is not even that toxic. Almost 90% of this is me saying the same thing the enemy top laner was saying to me to try and tilt me.

The Aggressor: tf jungler?
The Aggressor: nope
The Aggressor: did it last game
The Aggressor: and my jungler still died
The Aggressor: on red
The Aggressor: gg
The Aggressor: its because im in promos
The Aggressor: riot always gives me these in promos
The Aggressor: last game they gave me an inter
The Aggressor: bot needs better warding
The Aggressor: you both have 3 wards
The Aggressor: you dont fight
The Aggressor: without vision
The Aggressor: i am
The Aggressor: im focusing on kled
The Aggressor: who is now 2/2/2
The Aggressor: happens when you over push
The Aggressor: hes 2 levels above you
The Aggressor: why fight that
The Aggressor: eh i give up
The Aggressor: kled comes back all because he tps bot
The Aggressor: feelsgoodman
The Aggressor: bored tbh
The Aggressor: bored tbh
The Aggressor: just another lost game
The Aggressor: i make it easy lol?
The Aggressor: you ult bot after i 1v1 you and shit on you early game
The Aggressor: and bot doesnt know what overpushing is
The Aggressor: welp you lost 1v1 early game
The Aggressor: when you had more items
The Aggressor: ?
The Aggressor: you ult to second tower?
The Aggressor: rofl
The Aggressor: 1/3 has 70% winrate
The Aggressor: kid
The Aggressor: you got fed off
The Aggressor: bot lane
The Aggressor: no shit jinx
The Aggressor: why do you think i killed him easy top
The Aggressor: then he tps bot from going 0/1 to 2/2/2
The Aggressor: rofl lulu
The Aggressor: ?
The Aggressor: from 6/2 to 8/5
The Aggressor: feelsboostedman
The Aggressor: yup
The Aggressor: mad cuz bad
The Aggressor: you?
The Aggressor: ?
The Aggressor: rip
The Aggressor: 6/2 to 8/7
The Aggressor: how boosted are you
The Aggressor: 8/7
The Aggressor: feed more babe
The Aggressor: 8/7
The Aggressor: ?
The Aggressor: 8/8
The Aggressor: from 6/2
The Aggressor: rofl
The Aggressor: ^
The Aggressor: me cait and azir are poke champs
The Aggressor: not really an all in comp
The Aggressor: get qss fam
The Aggressor: get tp[
The Aggressor: top
The Aggressor: azir blue?
The Aggressor: well id hope so
The Aggressor: gee geeeee
The Aggressor: 9/9 LUL
The Aggressor: "new broken omg freelo"
The Aggressor: "tf jungle"

Game 2: This one is basically the same thing but with a team mate. I asked a simple question of why elise hasnt ganked top at all when i have been calling out all these sums hes been using. Yet she gets mad that I asked her that and started flaming me. Then a little later on she would just run it down my lane and give darius kills.

The Aggressor: is that a new skin ww?
The Aggressor: ive never seen it before
The Aggressor: dang
The Aggressor: so your account is worth thousands of dollars then xD
The Aggressor: ill give you $34?
The Aggressor: i buy jayce skins and jayce
The Aggressor: thats it xD
The Aggressor: that bs range tho on darius w or e
The Aggressor: i hate this game
The Aggressor: no sums top
The Aggressor: darius f down for 1 minute
The Aggressor: no sums mid
The Aggressor: ill come soon
The Aggressor: ww bot side
The Aggressor: no sums top/mid
The Aggressor: why have i not gotten any ganks yet elise
The Aggressor: i keep calling these darius flashes
The Aggressor: and i get 0 ganks
The Aggressor: goodbye random
The Aggressor: idc if you mute me lol
The Aggressor: im done gg
The Aggressor: this elise gets fed and then just afk farms the rest of game
The Aggressor: doesnt know how to carry
The Aggressor: this elise
The Aggressor: is trash
The Aggressor: and where was xayah and elise?
The Aggressor: also i went back because i knew i was dead
The Aggressor: because unless you dont know how zilean kits is
The Aggressor: it speeds up darius
The Aggressor: hed just grab me and kill me
The Aggressor: report elise inting
The Aggressor: i had 10% health you dip shit
The Aggressor: all darius had to do was r me
The Aggressor: youre a dumbass
The Aggressor: youre also a support main
The Aggressor: you know nothing kid
The Aggressor: gee gee

Game 3 We literally had 2 inters this game, Voli and Yasuo. Even the Xayah and Fiddlesticks agreed with me to report them for inting. 

The Aggressor: the afk got the kill
The Aggressor: woooooooooooo
The Aggressor: good thing riven took all lethality runes lol
The Aggressor: yas ward
The Aggressor: stop overextending
The Aggressor: ...
The Aggressor: yas you cant be just walking into his soldiers lol
The Aggressor: i didnt
The Aggressor: also you need control wards fam
The Aggressor: idc
The Aggressor: push lanes first
The Aggressor: yasuo with tunnel vision lol
The Aggressor: we saw twitch
The Aggressor: lol
The Aggressor: rofl
The Aggressor: yasuo i have no mana
The Aggressor: i couldnt tp
The Aggressor: quit inting
The Aggressor: why are we all split up
The Aggressor: makes 0 fucking sense
The Aggressor: voli is in river
The Aggressor: yas and xayah top jungle
The Aggressor: fiddle in base
The Aggressor: like ffs
The Aggressor: could be that yasuo has a shit kda on yasuo
The Aggressor: and could be that voli has a 0% winrate on voli
The Aggressor: gg
The Aggressor: xayah
The Aggressor: we dont care
The Aggressor: keep that to yourself
The Aggressor: report yasuo
The Aggressor: trolling all game
The Aggressor: and toxic
The Aggressor: bitch i tried peeling you
The Aggressor: stfu with your you and fiddle crap
The Aggressor: Voli
The Aggressor: look at fiddles build
The Aggressor: he has no sightstone
The Aggressor: so guess what i have to do
The Aggressor: And you see me warding voli
The Aggressor: yet your dumbass goes in
The Aggressor: gg

I get that I was punished for being toxic while I was tilted for having people on my own team flame me for stupid stuff. But I was not even given 1 warning? Not a chat restriction, no 25/10 in-game chat restriction, no 1/14 day ban? You guys just jumped straight to a perma ban? How is this even fair? Was I really that severely toxic to be given a perma ban without a warning?

replies.body:
> My Account Just Got Perma-Banned Without 1 Warning

The title of this post is wildly inaccurate.

This is your 4th penalty. You escalated through the entire schedule:
10-game CR
25-game CR
14-day ban (where you were told the next would be a pema)
Perma-ban

Only 3 chat logs are given in reform cards, but the system also tracks all of your recent notable negative games. 25% of your games are considered toxic, and could potentially result in a penalty.

I see in a later post on this thread you say you never had a 14-day ban. You did.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8FBQvz7A,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-05-22T22:56:59.156+0000)
>
> The title of this post is wildly inaccurate.
> 
> This is your 4th penalty. You escalated through the entire schedule:
> 10-game CR
> 25-game CR
> 14-day ban (where you were told the next would be a pema)
> Perma-ban
> 
> Only 3 chat logs are given in reform cards, but the system also tracks all of your recent notable negative games. 25% of your games are considered toxic, and could potentially result in a penalty.
> 
> I see in a later post on this thread you say you never had a 14-day ban. You did.

Thanks for checking in, Tantram. I can rest easy now. To the OP? Please don't falsify information. Riot CAN check.

Appreciate the update, Tantram. :)

>To the OP? Please don't falsify information. Riot CAN check.

Grats, those punishments were probably from like last year. Because I didnt play on this account for months, then when I came back my first penalty was a perma ban. I was told warnings and what not reset after about 6 months.

Then you were misinformed. It's a combination of time and games played.
Besides, that would still mean you lied about not having received previous punishments. You very directly stated that you were
>not even given 1 warning? Not a chat restriction, no 25/10 in-game chat restriction, no 1/14 day ban?

You might blame misinformation for not being aware that you could still be permabanned, you cannot blame that misinformation for actively lying to people. If you had been honest from the get go you even would have had your answer as to why you were permabanned a lot quicker.

wow... you actually made him come here from that other thread.
I've been seeing you around everywhere in this board. I'd mod you if i was a rioter XD

> [{quoted}](name=mohxbox36021,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8FBQvz7A,comment-id=000a00010000,timestamp=2017-05-23T06:30:31.604+0000)
>
> wow... you actually made him come here from that other thread.
> I've been seeing you around everywhere in this board. I'd mod you if i was a rioter XD

Didn't make him! Just asked nicely, because this was an odd thread I felt needed attention.

Thanks though! I try. :)
Np.
I'm relieved I read this. I'm always worrying that I go too far when I have bad games (they happen to everyone) and I might someday get perma-banned without warning.
Can you tell me how long ago those chat restrictions/14 day bans were? Because I dont remember ever getting a chat restriction on this account.

Did u ever had chat restrictions?

Also i see u are griefing in your games

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2501434588/232633633?tab=builds
Buying all tears when youre dead and theyre destroying nexus is not griefing. And I never had chat restrictions.

> [{quoted}](name=The Aggressor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8FBQvz7A,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-05-20T10:54:09.014+0000)
>
> The Aggressor: youre also a support main
>The Aggressor: you know nothing kid


This is one of the most toxic things I have ever read, riot did a good job in permanently banning you.
New level of toxicity beyond racial/homophobic slurs! Calling someone a Support Main now permabans your account!
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/152/591/f3e.jpg
I hear that almost on a daily. If those 2 lines were ban worthy half this community would be gone lol

> [{quoted}](name=The Aggressor,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8FBQvz7A,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-05-20T10:54:09.014+0000)
>
> Buying all tears when youre dead and theyre destroying nexus is not griefing. And I never had chat restrictions.

True. I agree with u. Thats why i didnt link those games where u bought minute before end.  This game however u bought tears at 17:25 first.  I have had players like u in games, who just sit on fountain to preserve their KDA, spamming "report this, report that", flaming team and buying nonsense. And your chat log matches that.

> [{quoted}](name=archerno1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8FBQvz7A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-20T10:05:38.030+0000)
>
> Did u ever had chat restrictions?
> 
> Also i see u are griefing in your games
> 
> http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2501434588/232633633?tab=builds

That would do it.

That wouldnt do it lol. If you look at it, it says i bought all tears like a minute before the game ended. I cant say exactly what happened, but odds are my whole team died and we got stuck in fountain.

The game ended 20:23.
You sold your items at 17:13. That's 3 minutes.
That's 1/7 of the whole game?!?!?!?

Edit:
lol http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2501973507/232633633?tab=builds
4 minutes before the game ended.
Well, you deserved it to be perma banned.

Even in the last minute of the game, all the system might see is the fact that you have 6 Tears and not worry or notice about the circumstance (of the game being over basically) and ban you for that in addition to the chat logs.
The system won't punish you for selling all items and buying tears the last minute. It's more advanced than that. It has access to all information we have and more.
See that is what I would think too, but I am also considering bans from chat. I understand it is a slightly different bag of worms, but if I repeat what is being said to me; I can still get banned.

No the system also gets context from chat. You can repeat something someone else said, and the system will know. People often assume the system to be simple, and only scan for specific words, but that is simply not true. It is a machine learning wonder and get gather context and punish based on feedback from Riot and the community.

Scenario:

Someone called me a %%%got. He will get banned, since this is not OK.
In that game I type: "Hey, remember to report xxx, he called me a %%%got." I will not be punished, that is fine.

Had I typed: "report xxx, the retard called me a %%%got" I will get punished, since this is nok OK.
Ahh. Thank you. I could really only base it off cases I have seen on here. In which most times it is the first of the examples.

Riot Tantram plz?

Not real chat logs?

Not first time offence?

Actual mistake in the system?
Those are the real chat logs tho. I dont remember any warnings happening on this account, and if there was, most it couldve been was a 10 game chat restriction.

I was simply calling for Tantram. You don't have any real proof the logs arent edited, but there would be no point in posting edited chatlogs, so I believe you. But I wanted to call for Tantram anyways to shed some light on the situation.
He is a Rioter im guessing?
Yeah
I wanna see the {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}}
Just replying to let you know we got the {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}}
Tyvm
Tyvm

ehhhhhhhhh...

I don't find something that toxic for an instant perma ban... just confirming but you never got a 14 day ban in the past 6 months right?
idk. a red reply would be good
Never got a 14 day ban on this account. I just finished getting it to level 30 4 days ago

hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm...

If what you say is true, then this shouldn't be a perma. But then again we don't know the whole story.

* Don't know if these are uneditted logs
* Can't see your pre/post/out of game chat
* Can't see your actions ingame
* Don't know your behavioral history

Contact Riot support if you wish to contest this punishment.
I understand that you acknowledge there is toxicity in your chat. I see the toxicity, but I don't see anything worth skipping punishment tiers. I'd suggest opening a support ticket.
Where do you submit support tickets?
I think that https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new is the place to do it.
If you've had a 2-week suspension prior to this, that could be the case.

CAN YOU STOP SAYING GG BEFORE THE GAME IS ACTUALLY OVER. People like you are so frustrating to play with. It's as if you've never heard of comebacks. I've watched so many games where teams have an open nexus and haven't taken a single enemy tower yet they've come back. The amount of throws in this game are unbelievable. The game isn't over until the nexus blows up and you need to fix your mentality. I swear, I wish saying gg in certain situations becomes a reportable offense for negative attitude.

Start a new account and stop thinking you have a safety net for being jackass I guess...

I don't know what to tell you. :(

try changing your name to something that promotes team play rather than creates prejudice against you.....seriously...how can you be that dense?

But oh yeah, you chat too much, bottom line so they probably reported the *f* out of you.
My name is The Aggressor, how is that bad?
Bumpidy
bumpidy
bumpidy
